name: FluoroSyl 880.00
description: FluoroSyl is triethoxysilane terminated, bifunctional perfluoropolyether (PFPE) designed as a low surface energy treatment for glass, siliceous surfaces, metals, and other substrates that have hydroxyl (â€“OH) groups on the surface. FluoroSyl is a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating. FluoroSyl provides long-lasting, antifouling, anti-fingerprint, and anti-smudge properties. FluoroSyl 880 is a good replacement for Fluorolink S10.
